short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome host extension integration with iPECS One softphone UC client that is introduced by Ericsson LG.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
a.	iPECS ONE Integration Extension. The Chrome host extension integration with iPECS One softphone UC client that is introduced by Ericssion LG.
b.	This Integration Extension enables the integration of approved headsets with call control, mute & ring alerts
